org.usfirst.frc.team871.tools

Class LimitedSpeedController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team871.tools.LimitedSpeedController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDOutput, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SpeedController

    public class LimitedSpeedController
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SpeedController
    An implementation of SpeedController which stops the motor at the specified limits.
    Author:
    Team871
